Package uo.ri.cws.application.service.spare

Interface SuppliesCrudService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SuppliesCrudServiceImpl
public interface SuppliesCrudService

    Nested Classes

    static class  SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Registers a new supply in the system for the indicated provider and spare part

    Removes from the system the supply uniquely indicated by the nif and code (a supply can be removed with no other considerations)

  • Method Details

    • add

      java.lang.String add​(SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Registers a new supply in the system for the indicated provider and spare part
      Parameters:
      dto -
      Returns:
      the id of the new registered supply
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - there already exist a supply for the provider and the spare part - the delivery term or the price are negative - does not exist the provider - does not exist the spare part

    • delete

      void delete​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Removes from the system the supply uniquely indicated by the nif and code (a supply can be removed with no other considerations)
      Parameters:
      providers - nif
      spare - part code
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the indicated supply does not exist

    • update

      void update​(SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Updates the supply with the new data from the incoming dto
      Parameters:
      dto -
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - it does not exist a supply for the provider and the spare part - the delivery term or the price are negative - the version field of the incoming dto does not match the version of the persistent entity

    • findByNifAndCode

      java.util.Optional<SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto> findByNifAndCode​(java.lang.String nif, java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      nif -
      code -
      Returns:
      the supply dto uniquely identified by the provider nif and spare part code or Optional.empty() if does not exist
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • findByProviderNif

      java.util.List<SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto> findByProviderNif​(java.lang.String nif) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      provider - nif
      Returns:
      the list (might be empty) of supply dto served by the provider identified by its nif
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • findBySparePartCode

      java.util.List<SuppliesCrudService.SupplyDto> findBySparePartCode​(java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      spare - part code
      Returns:
      the list (might be empty) of supply dto identified by the spare part code
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT
